data.comment: The big names in today's match at Volkswagen Arena have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Leipzig at Volkswagen Arena.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Admir Mehmedi of Wolfsburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Wout Weghorst (Wolfsburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
In Wolfsburg Wolfsburg drive forward through Paulo Otavio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Leipzig in Wolfsburg.
Daniel Schlager awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolfsburg.
Daniel Schlager signals a Leipzig throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Daniel Schlager awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Leipzig.
Free kick Wolfsburg.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
Xaver Schlager (Wolfsburg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg's Renato Steffen breaks free at Volkswagen Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Leipzig have a goal kick.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Leipzig territory.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Leipzig capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolfsburg's half?
Can Leipzig get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Leipzig.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Leipzig's Christopher Nkunku gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Wolfsburg defender.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leipzig.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Daniel Schlager awards the away team a throw-in.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
Goal kick for Leipzig at Volkswagen Arena.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Wolfsburg.
Throw-in Leipzig.
Daniel Schlager signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Leipzig are coming forward and Angelino gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolfsburg's Admir Mehmedi gets in a shot on goal at Volkswagen Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Wolfsburg drives forward and Admir Mehmedi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Wolfsburg's Admir Mehmedi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Leipzig have a goal kick.
Leipzig's Konrad Laimer has been booked in Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg needs to be cautious. Leipzig have an attacking throw-in.
In Wolfsburg Leipzig attack through Yussuf Poulsen. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Leipzig at Volkswagen Arena.
Throw-in for Leipzig in the half of Wolfsburg.
Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wolfsburg are pushing forward but Maximilian Arnold's finish is wide of the goal.
Daniel Schlager awards Leipzig a goal kick.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway in Wolfsburg.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Leipzig.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leipzig.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Leipzig close to the penalty box.
Daniel Schlager signals a throw-in for Leipzig, close to Wolfsburg's area.
Daniel Schlager awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
Yussuf Poulsen for Leipzig gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Dayot Upamecano (Leipzig) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
The away team replace Emil Forsberg with Dani Olmo.
Timo Werner is replacing Yussuf Poulsen for the away team.
Marcel Sabitzer gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leipzig.
Wolfsburg push upfield but Daniel Schlager quickly pulls them for offside.
In Wolfsburg, Leipzig push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Wolfsburg make their first substitution with Joao Victor replacing Admir Mehmedi.
Paulo Otavio (Wolfsburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
Leipzig drive upfield and Dani Olmo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Wolfsburg defender.
Leipzig's Christopher Nkunku breaks free at Volkswagen Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolfsburg's Wout Weghorst gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolfsburg.
Free kick Wolfsburg.
At Volkswagen Arena, Wolfsburg are penalized for being offside.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Leipzig territory.
Leipzig to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Leipzig.
Daniel Schlager signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
Leipzig have a dangerous throw-in.
Maximilian Arnold of Wolfsburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Leipzig at Volkswagen Arena.
In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Oliver Glasner is making the team's second substitution at Volkswagen Arena with Felix Klaus replacing Josip Brekalo.
Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
Wout Weghorst is booked for the home team.
Xaver Schlager (Wolfsburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Xaver Schlager for Wolfsburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Daniel Schlager awards Leipzig a goal kick.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
The away team have replaced Angelino with Ademola Lookman. This is the third substitution made today by Julian Nagelsmann.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Leipzig get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Leipzig.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolfsburg.
Jerome Roussillon is on a sub for Renato Steffen for Wolfsburg.
Leipzig's Christopher Nkunku is on target but unsuccessful.
Wolfsburgâ€™s Koen Casteels is on his feet again at Volkswagen Arena.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Wolfsburg to check on Koen Casteels, who is grimacing with pain.
Wolfsburg's Xaver Schlager misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Leipzig goal kick.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Wolfsburg are in shooting range from this free kick.
Daniel Schlager will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Leipzig to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
Patrik Schick (Leipzig) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
Dani Olmo (Leipzig) gets a yellow card.
